# 牛客运营岗面试真题宝典 2021~2022

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/niu-keyun-yinggang-mianshi-zhenti-baodian-2021-2022
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/niu-keyun-yinggang-mianshi-zhenti-baodian-2021-2022
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install niu-keyun-yinggang-mianshi-zhenti-baodian-2021-2022
niu-keyun-yinggang-mianshi-zhenti-baodian-2021-2022 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g niu-keyun-yinggang-mianshi-zhenti-baodian-erlingeryi-erlingerer
niu-keyun-yinggang-mianshi-zhenti-baodian-erlingeryi-erlingerer <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
